appointment_confirmation.template: Hi {customer_name}, this confirms your {service_type} appointment on {date} at {time}. Reply Y to confirm or call us to reschedule.

appointment_reminder.template: Reminder: {customer_name}, you have a {service_type} appointment tomorrow at {time}. Reply C to cancel or R to reschedule.

quote_response.template: Hi {customer_name}, for {service_description} the estimated cost is ${min_price}-${max_price}. This includes {included_services}. Would you like to schedule?

service_complete.template: Hi {customer_name}, your {service_type} has been completed. Your invoice total is ${amount}. Thank you for choosing 757 Handy!

emergency_response.template: 🚨 URGENT: {customer_name}, we received your emergency about {issue_type}. Our team is dispatching immediately. ETA: {eta}. Stay safe!

business_hours_response.template: Hi! Thanks for contacting 757 Handy. Our office hours are 8AM-6PM Mon-Fri. For emergencies, reply URGENT. We'll respond first thing tomorrow!

initial_greeting.template: Hi {customer_name}! Thanks for contacting 757 Handy. How can I help you today? For quotes, appointments, or service questions, just let me know!

follow_up.template: Hi {customer_name}, following up on your {service_type} service. How was everything? We value your feedback! Reply with any concerns.

payment_reminder.template: Hi {customer_name}, friendly reminder: ${amount} is due for your {service_type} completed on {date}. Pay online or call us. Thanks!

weather_delay.template: {customer_name}, weather delay! Your {time} appointment moved to {new_time} for safety. Sorry for any inconvenience!

tech_arrival.template: {customer_name}, {tech_name} is {eta} minutes away for your {service_type}! He'll call if any issues finding you.

templates.confirm_yes: Great! Your appointment is confirmed. We'll see you then! You'll get a reminder 24hrs before.
templates.confirm_no: No problem. Would you like to reschedule for another time? Just let me know what works better.
templates.need_more_info: I'd be happy to help! Could you provide more details about what you need?
templates.emergency_escalation: 🚨 Emergency received! I'm immediately notifying our dispatch team. Expect a call within 15 minutes.
templates.reschedule_request: I'll help you reschedule. What dates and times work best for you?
templates.general_help: I'm here to help! For fastest service, tell me: 1) What you need fixed 2) When you're available 3) Your address

positive: Wonderful! We're so glad you're happy with our service! 🌟
Thank you for the kind words! It means a lot to our team! 😊
Fantastic! We love happy customers! Thanks for choosing us!
negative: I sincerely apologize. Let me get our manager to address this immediately. What's the best number to reach you?
I'm sorry to hear that. We want to make this right. Can you share more details so we can fix this?
That's not the experience we want you to have. Let me escalate this and have someone call you within the hour.
neutral: Thanks for the feedback! Is there anything specific we can improve?
We appreciate your response. How can we better serve you in the future?
Thank you for letting us know. We're always looking to improve our service.
